conformanceTests.description: Due to testing issues with Selenium the results are not always correct when run with Selenium RC.

falseNegative.description: The following is a list of false negatives (test that pretent to fail but are actually running correctly when run in Selenium IDE)
falseNegative.test: error JSP does not work in RC runner yet

notTestable.description: ConformanceTest case can't be automated executed by Selenium (IDE / RC) yet

erroneousTest.description: Conformance Test itself is not correct
erroneousTest.test: needs review. Check if last() within repeat is really bound to repeat item and not to enclosing trigger
xforms-scroll-last/first events are dispatched to often (look like they are dispatched by every repeat-item)
dispatching custom event / event listener within instance

failingTest.test: initial index for repeat is 1 not 3 / Solution: evaluate initial setindex() action before index() function
